Title: US Supreme Court weighing presidential powers in new term
Summary: Donald Trump’s unprecedented expansion of the powers of the US presidency will be put to the test when the Supreme Court returns for its fall term on Monday . “The crucial question will be whether it serves as a check on the White House,’ says the court .

Title: Year after Borno floods, survivors left ‘high and dry’
Summary: A year after the floodwaters crashed through the northeastern Nigerian city of Maiduguri, the place where Maryam Jidda’s house used to stand is still an empty patch of mud . More than 300,000 residents were displaced and dozens killed when a year ago the floods hit the city .

Title: Trump govt brands US cities war zones
Summary: A judge blocked the White House from sending troops to another Democrat-run city . The Trump administration branded Chicago a “war zone” Sunday as a justification for deploying soldiers against the will of local Democratic officials .

Title: France’s new PM resigns after less than a month in office
Summary: France’s new prime minister resigns after less than a month in office . Sebastien Lecornu has submitted the resignation of his former prime minister . France's new PM resigns in a political crisis and deal a fresh blow to President Macron .

Title: Meet Imisi, the fourth woman to win BBNaija
Summary: Emisioluwa Opeyemi Ayanwale, better known as Imisi, has made history as the fourth woman to win Big Brother Naija . Her win was announced during the live grand finale on Sunday .

Title: Nigeria wins 3 gold, other medals as int’l para badminton championship ends in Abia
Summary: Governor announced cash award of $50,000 to all 144 athletes from 13 countries that featured in the competition . The governor also announced a cash award for each of the 144 athletes .

Title: The Role of Payday Loans in Supporting Short-Term Cash Flow Needs
Summary: Nearly 40% of Americans cannot afford a $400 emergency need without borrowing or selling . The Federal Reserve's latest Economic Well-Being survey found that 40% cannot afford to buy or sell . Payday Loans in Supporting Short-Term Cash Flow Needs .

Title: FIFA U-20 World Cup: Nigeria qualify for round of 16, to face Argentina [Full fixtures]
Summary: Nigeria’s Flying Eagles secured a place in the Round of 16 at the ongoing FIFA U-20 World Cup in Chile after a 1–1 draw with Colombia in Talca on Monday morning . The Flying Eagles will face Argentina in the last 16 of the tournament .

Title: OPEC+ increases oil output by 137,000 bpd
Summary: OPEC+ increases oil output by 137,000 barrels per day (bpd) Organisation of Petroleum Exporting Countries and its allies, OPEC+, has increased oil output .

Title: France’s new PM resigns after one month in office
Summary: France's new PM resigns after one month in office . Lecornu's stint in office was the shortest ever for a prime minister in modern France .
